warn.description: The reporting player must use the correct category for the report, or the reported player has not been breaking a rule or guideline for some time.
RP must strictly be on Party chat, Local chat, or Voice-chat.
Using foreign languages that are not detected and mistaken for English by the auto-mod or repeating the same message with minute differences more than twice in a short amount of time.
Repeating the same word/sentence or having heavy background noises. The player's Voice Chat Mode must be on music if playing music.
Intentionally targeting another player persistently in the form of messaging, voice-chatting, following, killing, etc.
Disturbing a zone in forms that go against that zone's intended purpose.
Constantly disturbing a group of players not in zones.
Attempting to role-play erotically or online date.
Attempting to gain an advantage over other players in the form of no-clipping, TPing, healing, repairing, etc.

kick.description: The reporting player must use the correct category for the report, or the reported player has not been breaking a rule or guideline for some time.
Names that give rise to unnecessary arguments include political and offensive names.
Pornographic and indecent names or names made up of numbers with the same length as Server IDs and names that are only punctations or symbols.
Intentionally targeting another player persistently in the form of messaging, voice-chatting, following, killing, etc.
Disturbing a zone in forms that go against that zone's intended purpose.
Constantly disturbing a group of players not in zones.
Using social media handles in usernames.

mute.description: RP must strictly be on Party chat, Local chat, or Voice-chat.
Using foreign languages that are not detected and mistaken for English by the auto-mod or repeating the same message with minute differences more than twice in a short amount of time.
Name-calling, racism, homophobia, and any other light form of hate speech. (Toxicity in text-chat)
Creating or taking part in any argument, politically or otherwise.
Posting website links, accounts or server IPs foreign to RSM.
